Title: Visual Studio LoadTest Ramper
Description:
Visual Studio LoadTest 2010 Ramp-Up or Ramp-Down Control.

This control along with provided LoadTest plugin can help to ramp the current user load easily.
HomeWiki:
Visual Studio LoadTest 2010 Ramp-Up or Ramp-Down

This project contains 3 installers, when all of these are installed in an environment where Visual Studio LoadTest 2010 is being used, it will provide you with an option to Ramp-Up or Ramp-Down your current load on a given scenario.

When the load test is running, right click on the graph area and choose Max Users and choose Ramp-Up or Ramp-Down and it will provide a small dialog to capture the Ramp-Up or Ramp-Down by users and for a specific scenario. This should then make adjustments to the running user load.

For the above to work, in your .loadtest file add the Ramp plugin to it. Ramp plugin for the .loadtest is delivered as one of the 3 installers mentioned above.
